description: Chat with videos using TwelveLabs Pegasus API.

video_id.info: Enter a Video ID for a previously indexed video.

index_name.info: Name of the index to use. If the index doesn't exist, it will be created.

index_id.info: ID of an existing index to use. If provided, index_name will be ignored.

model_name.info: Pegasus model to use for indexing

message.info: Message to chat with the video.

temperature.info: Controls randomness in responses. Lower values are more deterministic, higher values are more creative.
